application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T404) - Prune to clear building by 1m, lift over fencing to clear it by 1m.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T420) - Lift low canopy to 3m over footpath.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T424) - Lift low canopy to 3-4m to allow suitable clearance over access road's and footpath.1 x Holm Oak (applicants ref. T442) - Lift low canopy to 3 m over footpath.1 x Japanese Cherry (applicants ref. T453) - Lift low canopy to 3m.1 x Norway Maple (applicants ref. T462) - Lift low canopy to 3m over footpath.2 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T503, T504) - Prune to clear building by 1m.1 x English Oak (applicants ref. T533) - Reduce crown by approximately 2m to encourage new growth. Remove all deadwood throughout crown over 30mm in diameter or 1m in length.1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T621) - Fell.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T623) - Remove debris/vegetation to allow inspection of base clearing away from stem by 1m.2 x Lime (applicants ref. T632, T633) - Remove epicormic growth from base to 2m.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T636) - Remove debris/vegetation to allow inspection of base. Remove any undergrowth around tree and ivy up to 1.5m.1 x Snowy Mespilus (applicants ref. T683) - Fell.1 x Hawthorn (applicants ref. T776) - Prune to clear lamp column by 1m.2 x Himalayan Birch (applicants ref. T7696, T7697 ) - Fell.1 x Elm (applicants ref. T7826) - Fell.8 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T628, T7831, T7841, T7843, T7850, T7852, T7853, T7857) - Fell.1 x Goat Willow (applicants ref. T7837) - Fell.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T7840) - Fell.1 x Silver Birch (applicants ref. T7847) - Fell.1 x Unrecognised, 1 x Sycamore, 1 x Ash (applicants ref. G7848) - Fell.1 x English Oak (applicants ref. T7851) - Cut back large fallen stem away from building by 2m.1 x Alder (applicants ref. T7854) - Fell.14 x Sycamore (applicants ref. G7855) - Fell.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T7858) - Fell.
